name: The Last Spores
description:
Who would have thought? After all this time, there is only one  living organism on the planet ... a tiny pink fungus!

Help the fungus grow it's roots to collect all the SPORES, and give life on Earth a new chance.

How to play?
You only need your mouse to play.

  • Click on the node on your root you want to grow from ( start with the fungi) 
  • Then click on a target node to grow into! Continue to keep on growing deeper and deeper!
  • You can select any node on your root again, and split your root by selecting a new target nearby!
  • Grab and drag the background to pan the view up and down. 
  • Growing the root is using energy. Collect energy blobs   to keep on going! 
  • Collect 20 spore pods  to win the game and save the planet!

"The Last Spores" is a  chill puzzle game we created for Ludum Dare 48.
Please vote for us in Ludum Dare: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/the-last-spores

Unity Developement by Bálint Fazekas
Design  by István Szép aka. Pestodesign 

Sadly our team was short of a composer this time, so the game has no sound effects. We suggest to play your favorite music on another browser tab, and chill into the game :)

Thank you for playing!
